epilogue.collapse_breakdown: Every system overloaded at once. The staff scattered and you hit the pavement.
epilogue.collapse_hunger: You waited too long to resupply; hunger did what the Senate couldn’t.
epilogue.collapse_vehicle: Mechanical failure drained every reserve until the run collapsed.
epilogue.collapse_weather: The elements slowed you, then stopped you. No lobbyist beats a blizzard.
epilogue.exposure: Heatstroke or frostbite, the weather finished what politics started.
epilogue.generic: The journey ends unfinished, but the next share code could rewrite the story.
epilogue.vehicle_failure: The campaign van finally gave up. The trail ends in a cloud of steam.
epilogue.exposure_cold: Heatstroke or frostbite, the weather finished what politics started.
epilogue.exposure_heat: Heatstroke or frostbite, the weather finished what politics started.
